'''''Amon Hen'' 44''' is the forty-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published on May [[1980]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Martin Hooper
* Contents
* Editorial
** By: Jeremy Morgan
* Announcement - ''[[Unfinished Tales]]''
* AGM Report
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Recollections of Tolkien
** By: [[Roger Lancelyn Green]] (inludes [[Index:Writings by J.R.R. Tolkien|quote attributed]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]])<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 262</ref>
* Tolk Folk
* Postal Auction Results
* "Year of the Dragon"
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* One Ring to Bind them All!
** Open Letter by: Jessica Yates
* Review: ''[[Tolkien's Art: A Mythology for England]]''
** By: Jessica Yates
* Letters
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* Library and Archives
* Mathoms
* Back Page
